appDesc.description:
More than 2 million players per month, Pinturillo 2 is the draw and guessing game more popular at the time.

A player draws something about the secret word and the rest must guess the word in a limited time. Guess fast to get more points.

Public table - Play with people from all over the world. Choose the room or play in a random table.
Private table - Play with friends and family at a private table. Up to 12 players.

FEATURES
• Draw and guess online with players from around the world
• Five languages: English, Spanish, French, Italian and Portuguese
• More than 5000 words
• Automatic and equitable help for all players
• Button to penalize other players for voting system
• Filter antiflood

---

Thanks for playing Pinturillo 2! We are happy to hear so many people are enjoying it. Thanks!
appDesc.message: The draw and guessing game more popular at the time with more than 2 million players per month.
